roleset.name: to record on magnetic tape
roleset.note: VIDEOTAPE-V NOTES: frames created by Jena (from videotape.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [our correspondent]-1 did an interview at the al-Jazeera's Beijing office today and happened *-1 to videotape the image 0 we are watching now.
example.arg: the image 0 we are watching now
